attributes.action: To extended the "Child Care" eliment of the Tax Credits for carers of young disbled people. .
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We would like to see the Tax Credit care eliment (know as "child care" costs) age limit raised to tweenty five.
This would allow for those of us working who care for a young disabled person, to continue to pay for "care" in the home or in a suitable establishment so that we can work once they have left education or need after school/college provsion or during school college holidays.
